mapper.select: select * from members order by id
select * from members where id=#{id} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.insert: insert into members (id, passwd, name, email, responsibility, cdate, pfilename, addr, phone) values (#{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{responsibility}, sysdate, #{pfilename}, #{addr}, #{phoneNumber} )

update.foreach: into center_info (id, center_name, sido, sigungu, zip_code, address, phone_number) values (#{i.id}, #{i.centerName}, #{i.sido}, #{i.sigungu}, #{i.zipCode}, #{i.address}, #{i.phoneNumber} )
